yakusa - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya kathakana walin liyawunu "yakusa" yana padaya 17wana siyawasa (kabuki-mono sanwidhanaya wethin arambaunu bawa wishwasa kereyi) 102,400 samajikayan pramanayaki[1] aparadhi kriyakarakam sajaradhi kriyakarakam saha/ho nithyanukula wyapara sanganya samajikayo pradhana kanda yamaguchi-gumi sumiyoshi-kayi inagawa-kayi samaharawita gokudo (極道, gokudo?)
ee ayata wiruddhawa damana polisiyata purawidya departhamenthuwen paminillak idiripath kala.
